final_answer.precision_note: 3 significant figures based on moles and volume data (2.00, 0.180, 0.220).

method: Calculate equilibrium concentrations: [NO2] = 0.180 / 2.00 = 0.0900 mol dm-3, [N2O4] = 0.220 / 2.00 = 0.110 mol dm-3. Substitute into the equilibrium constant expression Kc = [NO2]^2 / [N2O4] = (0.0900)^2 / 0.110 = 0.00810 / 0.110 = 0.0736.
